thread.title: EU tells Britain time has come to make Brexit choice

title: EU tells Britain time has come to make Brexit choice
text:
EU tells Britain time has come to make Brexit choice 12:26pm EST - 01:39 
The European Union's chief Brexit negotiator Michel Barnier has told Britain that the time has come for Britain to make a choice on what sort of relationship it wanted with the bloc after Brexit. As Ivor Bennett reports, Britain has now ruled out staying in any customs union with the EU after Brexit, but the nature of its trading relationship with the world's biggest trading bloc has split Theresa May's government and Conservative Party.
